arts.ttl: PSG vs Nice – Luis Enrique’s press conference live this Friday
arts.sum: This Saturday at 5 p.m. (CET), Paris Saint-Germain (1st) will face Nice (8th) at the Parc des Princes for Matchday 11 of the 2025-2026 Ligue 1 season. On the eve of this match, PSG coach Luis Enrique will hold a press conference at 1 p.m. You can follow the event live here (we will publish […]
